about_the_game:
I've come to the realization that there's so much about my own country that I don't know. In light of this, I've developed a game to share my journey of discovering Ukraine. It's Jigsaws with lot of useful features. Through this interactive experience, I hope to offer insights into the rich culture, history, and beauty of our country. I hope it will be interesting not only for jigsaw puzzle lovers;)

I want to keep this game free and I will update it from time to time with new pictures and features

  • Multiple puzzle pieces selection

  • 3 different Cutouts shapes

  • Rotation and Sorting features

  • Useful Zoom and Magnifier tool

  • Customizable background color

  • Wide cutout range

I used CC0, self generated content or pictures I have permission from the author.

I will try to deal with local photographers to provide more quality pictures and facts of my country.

Also, you can check my other puzzle game (which uses the same engine) Master of Pieces - Jigsaw Puzzles!

Enjoy game and share your thoughts! Peace!

name: Welcome to Ukraine

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7 or higher
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 or later with WDDM 1.0 driver
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: 2 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 or later with WDDM 1.0 driver
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any

short_description: I've come to the realization that there's so much about my own country that I don't know. In light of this, I've developed a game to share my journey of discovering Ukraine. Through this interactive experience, I hope to offer insights into the rich culture, history, and beauty of our country.
